concepts.name: Polynomials
concepts.description: Mathematical expressions consisting of variables and coefficients, involving terms with positive integer powers of the variables.

concepts.name: Degrees of Polynomials
concepts.description: The highest power of the variable in a polynomial determines its degree, such as constant, linear, quadratic, cubic, etc.

concepts.name: Addition and Subtraction of Polynomials
concepts.description: Combining or separating polynomial terms by aligning like terms and performing arithmetic operations.

concepts.name: Multiplication of Polynomials
concepts.description: Using distributive property to multiply each term of one polynomial by every term of another.

concepts.name: Factoring Polynomials
concepts.description: Reversing the distributive property to express polynomials as a product of simpler factors.

concepts.name: Special Products of Polynomials
concepts.description: Recognizing and factoring patterns like perfect squares, difference of squares, and sum/product of terms.

concepts.name: Zero-Product Property
concepts.description: If the product of two expressions equals zero, then at least one of the expressions must be zero, used to solve polynomial equations.

concepts.name: Factoring Quadratic Trinomials
concepts.description: Breaking down quadratic trinomials into binomial factors using methods based on coefficients.

concepts.name: Factoring by Grouping
concepts.description: Grouping terms in a polynomial to factor common terms, often used for polynomials with four or more terms.

concepts.name: Factoring Special Products
concepts.description: Techniques for factoring specific forms like perfect square trinomials and the difference of two squares.

concepts.name: Solving Polynomial Equations
concepts.description: Using factoring methods and the zero-product property to find the solutions of polynomial equations.

concepts.name: Applications of Polynomial Factoring
concepts.description: Using polynomial equations to solve real-world problems, such as geometry, area, and optimization scenarios.

concepts.name: Quadratic Equations
concepts.description: Equations involving a squared term, which can be solved by factoring, completing the square, or using the quadratic formula.

concepts.name: Real-World Problems with Quadratics
concepts.description: Applying quadratic equations to solve practical problems, including projectile motion and area calculations.

concepts.name: Pythagorean Theorem Applications
concepts.description: Using quadratic polynomials and the Pythagorean theorem to solve problems involving right triangles.
